Detailed Description

Used for connecting to an embedded MySQL Database.

This class used the embedded library of MySQL to open and connect to databases.

Member Function Documentation

bool DataBase::DataBaseOpen ( wxString  path  ) 

Function used to init the MySql embedded server and to open a database.

This function must be called before other Database functions.

Parameters:
path wxString containing the directory where live the database
Returns:
return true if library and connexion to the database ok

This function must be called before quitting the program

return TRUE if the database was close correctely

wxString DataBase::DatabaseGetVersion (  )

bool DataBase::DataBaseGetAllTableContent ( wxString  sTable  ) 

Get all data stored in a table.

This function just process the request, to get the result row by row, call the DataBaseGetNextResult() function.

Parameters:
sTable a String containing the table name
Returns:
TRUE if the request is valid.

int DataBase::DataBaseQuery ( wxString  myQuery  ) 

Used to execute a query on the database.

This function is mainly created to execute a query without results

Parameters:

Returns:
return 0 if the query works and the MYSQL error code otherwise.
